DOC.brief_title: Study Information Received About Fertility Infertility Patients Who Have Finished Treatment Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To determine amount information receive aspect fertility infertility patient cancer prior receive treatment comprehensive cancer center . Secondary - To analyze whether information receive patient related desire parent . - To analyze whether information receive patient related desire inform . - To determine whether relationship demographic data , diagnosis , quality life , associate psychosocial information receive patient . OUTLINE : Patients complete questionnaire ( Lickert QLQ-C30 ) amount information receive prior therapy psychosocial issue aspect fertility infertility within 1-2 year receive treatment .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis breast cancer , germ cell tumor , colon cancer , leukemia , lymphoma , sarcoma Free disease Completed treatment within past 12 year PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : ECOG performance status 01 Must able read selfcomplete study questionnaires No psychological condition may prevent participation study PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics No concurrent treatment ( hormonal treatment breast cancer allow )
